eg.projects

Interface Configurable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProjectActions
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HtmlActions, JavaActions, PerlActions, ProjectConfig

    public interface Configurable
    The interface to configure a project

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean configureProject(java.lang.String dir)
      Returns if a project can be successfully configured based on the entries in this settings window.
      void createSettingsWin()
      Creates an object the defines a setttings window
      java.lang.String getExecutableDirName()
      Returns the name of the directory where executable files are saved
      java.lang.String getProjectName()
      Returns the name of the project's root directory
      java.lang.String getProjectPath()
      Returns the project's root directory
      java.lang.String getSourceFileExtension()
      Returns the extension of source files for the project
      boolean isInProject(java.lang.String dir)
      If the specified directory equals or is in the project's root directory
      void makeSetWinVisible()
      Makes this settings window visible
      boolean retrieveProject(java.lang.String dir)
      Returns if a project stored in a preferences file can be retrieved
      void setConfiguringAction(java.awt.event.ActionListener al)
      Sets the ActionListener that is called when the entries in the settings window are applied
      void storeConfiguration()
      Stores the configuration in a preferences file
      boolean usesProjectFile()
      Returns the boolean that indicates if the project uses a (main) project file.

      • configureProject

        boolean configureProject(java.lang.String dir)
        Returns if a project can be successfully configured based on the entries in this settings window.
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that may equal or may be in the project's root directory
        Returns:
        if a project could be configured

      • retrieveProject

        boolean retrieveProject(java.lang.String dir)
        Returns if a project stored in a preferences file can be retrieved
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that may equal or may be in the project's root directory
        Returns:
        if a saved project could be retrieved

      • usesProjectFile

        boolean usesProjectFile()
        Returns the boolean that indicates if the project uses a (main) project file. False means that only the project's root directory is specified
        Returns:
        the boolean value

      • isInProject

        boolean isInProject(java.lang.String dir)
        If the specified directory equals or is in the project's root directory
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory
        Returns:
        if the specified directory belongs to the project
